item.title: The Most Used Words On Our Blog
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: I got tagged by Denny Cherry (@mrdenny on twitter) to create an image of the most used words on our blog. As you can see SQL rules here, I wonder why???? So how did I create this image? I used Wordle, Wordle is a toy for generating “word clouds” from text that you provide. The […]
item.content:encoded:
I got tagged by Denny Cherry (@mrdenny on twitter) to create an image of the most used words on our blog.

As you can see SQL rules here, I wonder why????

So how did I create this image? I used Wordle, Wordle is a toy for generating “word clouds” from text that you provide. The clouds give greater prominence to words that appear more frequently in the source text. You can tweak your clouds with different fonts, layouts, and color schemes
